about.title: About YariCrochetFina
about.subtitle: The Art of Handmade Crochet
about.description: Welcome to my world of unique crochet and knit creations. I'm Yaritza Salgado Fina, a passionate artisan who transforms each thread into a wearable work of art. Each piece I create tells a story, combining ancestral techniques with contemporary design.
about.passion: My passion for crochet began years ago and has transformed into a true calling. Each creation is the result of many hours of meticulous work, love for the craft, and a commitment to quality.
about.quality: I'm committed to using only premium materials and maintaining the highest standards of craftsmanship. Each piece is unique and made with love, especially for you.
